description: This file contains Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to guest invitations and RSVP handling in an event planning application. It defines request and response classes used for managing guest information and status updates.

classes.name: InviteGuestRequest
classes.description: DTO for inviting a guest, including email and optional name.

classes.name: UpdateGuestStatusRequest
classes.description: DTO for updating a guest's status with validation for allowed statuses.

classes.name: GuestResponse
classes.description: DTO representing guest details and RSVP status for responses.
